name: Keep Listening And Everybody Explodes LD37 Version
name_original: Keep Listening And Everybody Explodes LD37 Version
description:
"Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 37" Version

For PC Download, Android, HTML5, and MP3 of the theme song!

(Even though the HTML5 is supposed to pause if the window loses focus, it doesn't work if you only switch to different tabs, which pauses the audio but keeps the bomb clock (and internal game timer) counting. Nice, huh? So, everything gets out of sync if you do that, so don't do that.)

Have you ever wanted to play Keep Talking And Nobody Explodes, but you don't have any friends? Alternately, have you ever wanted to play while two people are talking to you at the same time to illustrate a larger socio/psychological metacognitive point?

If so, have we got the game for you!

Headphones recommended.

Graphics, voice acting, and writing by Corinne Groble.

Music, coding, voice acting, and writing by Brian Peters.

Ludum Dare Entry Page: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...

Theme song YouTube video:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g2P0NNmZrmw
